Filter.Name: home
Filter.Entry:
<FilterExpression xmlns:map="http://apache.org/cocoon/sitemap/1.0"> <!-- This resource contains a generic set of transformations that should be done before your own transformations. --> <map:generate type="sirunaGenerator"/> <!-- extract CSS and JS so that transformations can be done on them --> <map:transform type="sirunaScriptExtractor"/> <!-- make site xhtml compliant --> <map:transform type="sirunaCleaner"/> <!-- linearize tables --> <map:transform type="sirunaTableTransformer"> <map:parameter name="task0" value="linearize(//p:table,true)"/> </map:transform>
<!-- **************************** *** WAFL Transformations *** **************************** ***************************** --> <!-- make menu --> <map:transform type="sirunaDropdownTransformer"> <map:parameter name="cleanup_names" value="true"/> <map:parameter name="parent" value="//p:ul[@id='mainlevel-nav']"/> <map:parameter name="new_parent" value="//p:div[@id='nav']"/> <map:parameter name="form_name" value="topMenu"/> <map:parameter name="dropdown_title" value="--Main Menu--"/> <map:parameter name="rel_name_node" value=".."/> </map:transform> <!-- remove menu source --> <map:transform type="sirunaElementTransformer"> <map:parameter name="task0" value="remove(//p:ul[@id='mainlevel-nav'])"/> </map:transform>
<!-- Grouping menus together in the second dropbox --> <map:transform type="sirunaElementTransformer"> <!-- group all <ul class='menu'> together in one tag --> <map:parameter name="task0" value="wrapElements(//p:ul[@class='menu'], siruna_wafl_menu)"/> <map:parameter name="task1" value="removeKeepChildren(//p:siruna_wafl_menu/p:ul[@class='menu'])"/> </map:transform> <!-- Dropdown for all <ul class='menu'> --> <map:transform type="sirunaDropdownTransformer"> <map:parameter name="cleanup_names" value="true"/> <map:parameter name="parent" value="//p:siruna_wafl_menu"/> <map:parameter name="form_name" value="siruna_wafl_menu"/> <map:parameter name="dropdown_title" value="--Navigation--"/> <map:parameter name="rel_name_node" value=".."/> </map:transform>
<!-- Grouping the latest news links together in a dropdown --> <map:transform type="sirunaElementTransformer"> <!-- group all <ul class='latestnews'> together in one tag --> <map:parameter name="task0" value="wrapElements(//p:ul[@class='latestnews'], siruna_wafl_latestnews)"/> <map:parameter name="task1" value="removeKeepChildren(//p:siruna_wafl_latestnews/p:ul[@class='latestnews'])"/> </map:transform> <!-- Dropdown for all <ul class='latestnews'> --> <map:transform type="sirunaDropdownTransformer"> <map:parameter name="cleanup_names" value="true"/> <map:parameter name="parent" value="//p:siruna_wafl_latestnews"/> <map:parameter name="form_name" value="siruna_wafl_latestnews"/> <map:parameter name="dropdown_title" value="--Latest News--"/> <map:parameter name="rel_name_node" value=".."/> </map:transform>
<!-- Grouping the most read in a dropdown --> <map:transform type="sirunaElementTransformer"> <!-- group all <ul class='mostread'> together in one tag --> <map:parameter name="task0" value="wrapElements(//p:ul[@class='mostread'], siruna_wafl_mostread)"/> <map:parameter name="task1" value="removeKeepChildren(//p:siruna_wafl_mostread/p:ul[@class='mostread'])"/> </map:transform> <!-- Dropdown for all <ul class='mostread'> --> <map:transform type="sirunaDropdownTransformer"> <map:parameter name="cleanup_names" value="true"/> <map:parameter name="parent" value="//p:siruna_wafl_mostread"/> <map:parameter name="form_name" value="siruna_wafl_mostread"/> <map:parameter name="dropdown_title" value="--Most Read--"/> <map:parameter name="rel_name_node" value=".."/> </map:transform>
<!-- Cleaning up empty div's etc. --> <map:transform type="sirunaElementTransformer"> <map:parameter name="task0" value="removeEmptyElements(//p:div[@class='mainmenu'],true)"/> </map:transform>
<!-- This resource contains a generic set of transformations that should be done after your own transformations. --> <!-- scale images --> <map:transform type="sirunaImageTransformer"> <map:parameter name="task0" value="scale(//p:img,95)"/> </map:transform> <!-- make sure all url's in the page are rewritten, so that they to will lead to an adapted webpage --> <map:transform type="sirunaLinkRewriter"/> <!-- delete unused css --> <map:transform type="sirunaCSSCompactTransformer"/> <!-- make sure no width's are set in css > screenwidth --> <map:transform type="sirunaMakeCSSFit"> <map:parameter name="removeWidths" value="true"/> <map:parameter name="removeFloats" value="true"/> </map:transform> <map:serialize type="sirunaXHTMLSerializer"> <map:parameter name="enableJS" value="false"/> </map:serialize>
</FilterExpression>
